name: ICTOAN
description:
ICTOAN - short for "I can't think of a name" is a puzzle-game including magic and boolean-logic!

The game was made during the 48h Compo-Jam for Ludum Dare 40

Instructions (You should understand the game without instructions, but if not here is what to do:)

  • Try to open the doors
  • Depending on the amount of crystals you have collected, some objects appear or disappear
  • green: AND-Gate
  • purple: NOT-Gate
  • bombs explode, when all inputs are powered
  • You loose health, the more crystals you have collected, so think before you collect crystals!
  • If you can't find the solution: Remember, the level changes, based on the amount of crystals you have collected ;)
